description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the elevation of privilege issue in Tencent RapidJSON due to integer underflow:

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB updates from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure your system meets the following build requirements:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22631.3880
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22621.3880
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22000.3079
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.19045.4651
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.19044.4651
   - Ensure to review the installation notes associated with each KB.
   
**Details**:
- This update addresses CVE-2024-38517 which involves an integer underflow causing potential privilege escalation when parsing JSON files. It is crucial to keep your system updated to mitigate these risks.
- For manual installation, download the update packages from:
   - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running a compatible version as listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
